A.1 In order to connect the band with the app, please switch on the Bluetooth of your phone. Just in case there is some problem in connecting the band with the Bluetooth, please enable location services too for seamless app and band connection.

MevoFit is your true all round fitness coach that makes it easy and fun for you to get fit!\n\nMevoFit is a new way to approach fitness. It\'s not just an app but a wholesome integrated fitness approach that will change the way you perceive fitness. It\'s an all-in-one fitness app that brings ease by integrating all your fragmented fitness data at one place. So why use 5 apps just use one - \"MevoFit The Absolute Fitness\". The only app that brings Fitness with Benefits!

Q.1 How does my tracker count steps?

A.1 MevoFit Drive uses a 3-axis accelerometer to track your movement. An accelerometer is a device that turns movement (acceleration) into digital measurements (data) when attached to the body. By analyzing acceleration data, the device provides detailed information about frequency, duration, intensity, and patterns of movement to determine your steps taken, distance traveled, and calories burned.
Q.2 How to switch on the sleep mode?

A.2 In order to activate the sleep mode, you need to long press on the moon icon shown on the device. This will start tracking your sleep. Once you get please long press on the sun icon which replaced the moon to deactivate the sleep mode.
Q.3 How to set reminders on the band?

A.3 In order to set reminders on the band got to the reminder section, click on + and set the time & days on which you want to get the reminders. In order to switch off the reminders disable the same from the toggle.
Q.4 Why am I receiving not able to sync my band with the app?

A.4 In order to sync your app with the band make sure you have only 1 band paired with your iPhone. In order to unpair other device go to the setting section> Click on Bluetooth> Click on the i button and then forgot the device. This will enable smoother syncing between device and the app.
Q.5 Why am I receiving other people\'s messages/calls on my band?

A.5 This is happening because of the default feature of iPhone. In order to avoid this issue, it is recommended that you only have only 1 MevoFit Drive band paired to your device at one time. Check the code of your device by turing of the power and then switching it on again. Go to the Bluetooth section and see that only that device is paired with your iPhone. In order to unpair other device go to the setting section>click on Bluetooth>click on the i button and then forgot the device. This will enable smoother syncing between device and the app.

Why Should I Download Other Apps?
- You can use same login credentials across all MevoFit apps. So all your data is connected & synced.
- Earn credits from different apps and use them together to buy MevoFit Merchandise Gear at discounted price.

Your current health status is good. Please refer to the following detailed suggestions. To work and rest, moderate exercise, scientific diet and adequate sleep to improve physical fitness.
Stay up late and take part in outdoor activities. Maintain a positive, optimistic and happy mood.
To work hard to develop regular exercise habits, improve the bodys enthusiasm and excitement.

Often do some tricks to exercise the heart, such as the head backwards, his arms forced upward. Pay attention to eating habits, eat a variety of animal fat, eat more fresh vegetables and fruits, the diet should be light.

Your current state of health is average. Please refer to the detailed recommendations below. Make work and rest, strengthen exercise, pay attention to diet, and reduce day and night. Can improve the physical fitness. [0–70]

 Your current health is good. Please refer to the detailed recommendations below. A combination of work and rest, moderate exercise, scientific diet and adequate sleep to improve physical fitness. [70–90]

 Your current health status is excellent, please keep it. Please refer to the detailed recommendations below. A combination of work and rest, moderate exercise, scientific diet and adequate sleep to improve physical fitness. [90–100]

The diet should be light. Advocate eating seven or eighty percent full, while eating less animal fats and eating more fresh vegetables and fruits. [40–70]

 Do some small exercises to exercise your heart, such as the head tilting back and lifting your arms upwards. Pay attention to eating habits, eat less animal fat, eat more fresh vegetables and fruits, and eat light. [70–90] 

 Maintain good eating habits. Pay attention to balanced diet and nutritional mix. [90–100]

Appropriate exercise, participate in physical exercise as much as you can, develop your own hobbies, and develop weekly exercise habits. [40–70]

 Strive to develop regular exercise habits and improve the enthusiasm and excitement of the body. [70–90]

 Proper exercise to develop a habit of continuous exercise. [90–100]

Participate in social interaction and avoid emotional excitement. If the physical and mental load is too high for a long time, it is recommended to consult a psychiatrist [0–55]

 Avoid fatigue. Don't sit for a long time and walk around. [55–80]

 Maintain good mood, mental pleasure, and positive optimism. [80–100]

Pay attention to rest, try not to stay up late. [0–45] 

 Stay up late and take part in outdoor activities. Maintain a positive, optimistic and happy mood. [45–70]

 Maintain regular healthy living habits. [70–100]

Connection issues is found.Please re-launch the App!

As observed some connection issues have been found. Please restrict all battery optimization services like freeze in background mode, doze mode and more. All these services create problems in maintaining a stable connection.
If all the battery optimization services are switched off, and still connection issues are found. Kindly allow the app to manually reset your phone\'s bluetooth to maintain stable connection.
As observed some connection issues have been found. Kindly allow the app to manually reset your phone\'s bluetooth to maintain stable connection.
Kindly allow the app to manually reset your phone\'s bluetooth to maintain stable connection. The app will switch off and then switch on the bluetooth to improve connection
